data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: We can see from the picture that there are two adults and two kids. One of the kids is a little girl wearing an orange sweater, and she is driving a blue toy car. She looks excited to drive the car and it seems that she is trying to drive it well. However, the car she drives is not in good condition that one of the wheels seems broken and there are no headlights. But the little girl is still enjoying herself. Behind her, a man wearing a black jacket and jeans is bending down following the little girl, and it seems that he is trying to protect her while she is driving. Next to him, another girl wearing a pink sweater seems quite dirty, and she has black skin and a unique hairstyle. Behind them, another adult wearing a black shirt is following these two little girls. In the background, we can see a building where maybe their home. From this picture, we can assume that they may not be very rich but still enjoy their father-daughter time. （182字）
